Detailed Description

This class is used to describe what information of an entity changes frequently and should be sent frequently.

Member Function Documentation

int VolatileInfo::dirType ( float  priority  )  const

This method returns what volatile direction info should be sent.

Returns:
0 = Yaw, pitch and roll 1 = Yaw, pitch 2 = Yaw 3 = No direction
Note:
This assumes that the VolatileInfo is valid. That is, the direction priorities are in descending order.

bool VolatileInfo::hasVolatile ( float  priority  )  const

This method returns whether or not this object has volatile data to send.
